nodes.text: Gold Two was the callsign of the second member of Gold Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several beings went by the name Gold Two.
Rebel Alliance pilot Tiree used the callsign when he flew during the Battle of Yavin. Tiree was killed in the assault against the first Death Star.

In the lead up to the Battle of Endor, Ace Azzameen flew as Gold Two for a mission to meet with a delegation from the Bothan Spynet, the recapture of his family's space station, the rescue of Bothan spies from Imperial Customs, and while escorting the Defiance and Independence groups to the Rebel staging ground near Sullust.
During a simulation exercise to qualify for Wedge Antilles's new squadron, Hohass Ekwesh used the callsign of Gold Two.
